original_text: Now people run to send the news to the king of Babylon. They pass this message along the line: “The enemy has taken power over the whole city! Now people run to send the news to the king of Babylon. They pass this message along the line: “The enemy has taken power over the whole city! Now people run to send the news to the king of Babylon.
korean_text: 보발꾼은 보발꾼을 맞으려고 달리며 전령은 전령을 맞으려고 달려가 바벨론의 왕에게 전하기를 그 성읍 사방이 함락되었으며

sentences.original_text: Now people run to send the news
sentences.korean_translation: 이제 사람들이 소식을 전하기 위해 달려갑니다
